entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: The final event of the four hundred and twenty-second Quidditch World Cup is being introduced.

entities.name: bulgaria

entities.name: bertie bott's every flavor beans
entities.description: Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans advertisement was shown on the blackboard before the Quidditch World Cup final.

entities.description: Thousands of flags waved in the stands during the Quidditch World Cup final.
